title: Plate
provenance: J. A. Lloyd Hyde, American Art Association-Anderson Galleries, NY; WPW 1932
description: Circular plate with wide up-turned rim and scalloped edge; center cut with radiating petals filled with fine diamonds and fans between; rim cut with strawberry diamonds; glass bubbly.

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate.
glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-135.
